channel.title: Steve Kilpatrick – Lost In The Grooves

item.title: Crop Circles Uncovered!
item.dc:creator: garypiggold
item.description: If we can all quit staring at thecovers clothing Zeppelin’s big box sets for a few moments, let us ponder instead the metaphysical / comparatively higher fidelityheard round Michigan’s one and only Steve Kilpatrickand his Westside Crop Circles. Audible right now,yes indeed,(along with Me and Oprah, My Pajamas and The Pain even) right there … Continue reading "Crop Circles Uncovered!"
item.content:encoded:
If we can all quit staring at the
covers clothing Zeppelin’s big box sets for a few moments,

let us ponder instead
the metaphysical / comparatively higher fidelity
heard round Michigan’s one and only Steve Kilpatrick
and his Westside Crop Circles.

Audible right now,
yes indeed,
(along with Me and Oprah, My Pajamas and The Pain even)

right there amidst all the very latest Ear Candy.

Zoso it goes…..
